content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT

    TOP 100 
     -- result.filename() as 'filename'
     result.filepath(1) as 'year',
       result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*',
         DATA_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where result.filepath(1) = '2021'
